lines.flavourText: The Azmeri must never touch the Tears of Maji, lest Viridi weep.

lines.name: Replica Atziri's Acuity

explicitModifiers.text: You have Perfect Agony if you've dealt a Critical Strike recently

lines.flavourText:
"One of our researchers cut himself on Prototype #2,
and he has not stopped screaming for months..."

A sacrifice of blood calls forth His vengeance.
Let the righteous become the Hand of God.

lines.flavourText:
The Decay infects thought itself, leaving nothing
but hollow husks filled with virulent void...

lines.name: Cowl of the Cryophile

explicitModifiers.text: Can have a second Enchantment Modifier

lines.flavourText:
The villagers seared the blight with cold, but it only bloomed countless spears.

<default>{This item can be anointed by Cassia}

lines.name: Shattershard

explicitModifiers.text: Trigger Level 20 Shield Shatter when you Block

lines.flavourText: Fragile, explosive, and punishing.

lines.name: Cloak of Defiance

explicitModifiers.text: 10% of Damage is taken from Mana before Life

lines.flavourText:
When the throat roars,
As eyes weep,
When the hand grips hard
With trembling fingers,
When belly twists
Yet legs stand strong,
That is the work
Of the Defiant Heart.

lines.name: Saqawal's Winds

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (20-25) to (37-40) Cold Damage while you have Avian's Might
Adds (1-3) to (55-62) Lightning Damage while you have Avian's Might

lines.flavourText:
When the inferno spread across the land,
it was the First of the Sky who singed his feathers
as he brought the flames to a standstill.

lines.name: The Tempest Rising

explicitModifiers.text: (5-25)% increased Duration of Ailments on Enemies
You and Enemies in your Presence count as moving while affected by Elemental Ailments

lines.flavourText:
Where he tread, disintegrating storms of lightning
and death laid waste to all around him.

lines.name: Gravebind

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: Nearby Enemies Killed by anyone count as being Killed by you instead

lines.flavourText:
Try as you like to hide the
blood on your hands.
You'll still know the truth.

lines.name: Wildwrap
lines.flavourText:
"Laws are for city folk.
Can't try a man for murder if you can't find him."
- Taruk, Last of the Wildmen

explicitModifiers.text: Grants Level 20 Aspect of the Crab Skill
Bleeding cannot be inflicted on you
+5 to Maximum number of Crab Barriers

lines.flavourText:
The First of the Deep was the First of All.
It was He who conquered the waves,
who stood guard as land rose from sea.

The Maji were forbidden from touching virtue gems...
so their practical warriors employed geomancy instead.

When dead men rise and darkness falls

Twice as strong and twice as thick

The First of the Sky was the Last of the First.
It was he who showed us that our limits are self-imposed,
that what we take for law may just be an illusion.
